channel.title: Yet another Court Wizard
channel.description:
So, what’s core to the CW to me is that they want to die without being accused of game throwing. As such, I present my idea.
The Court Wizard:
Passive - Forbidden Magic: When you are attacked, you suicide to kill your attacker, bypassing night immunity.
Night Abilities -
Room of mirrors: Everyone targetting the player will be redirected to target themselves. The target will be redirected to target himself as well. (can't be used on self)
Mind Shield (three uses): protect yourself and another player from all negative effects and misinformation.
Sage: unchanged except the following passive is added:
Unlimitted Power: Kill yourslef and the Prince after you are jailed - bypasses all night immunity, heals, etc
